blogPost.excerpt: Audiblogs lets you listen to any web article in your podcast player in an Audible-like voice. Use it to "read" while you exercise, cook, do house chores, etc.
blogPost.body: Audiblogs lets you listen to any web article in your podcast player in an Audible-like voice. Use it to "read" while you exercise, cook, do house chores, etc.
blogPost.title: Audiblogs - Listen to any web article in your podcast player
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: Audiblogs可以让你在你的播客播放器中以类似Audible的声音收听任何网络文章。在你运动、做饭、做家务等时，可以用它来 "阅读"。
localize.tagline: 在您的播客播放器中收听任何网络文章。

localize.description: Audiblogs可以讓你在你的播客播放器中以類似Audible的聲音收聽任何網絡文章。在你運動、做飯、做家務等時，可以用它來 "閱讀"。
localize.tagline: 在您的播客播放器中收聽任何網絡文章。

previous.excerpt: Google Analytics meets intelligent algorithms: find hidden conversion opportunities in your Google Analytics data. A tool that analyzes your data and shows exactly how to improve your conversion rates. Offers audits and 24/7 monitoring of Google Analytics.
previous.title: Convertmind - Google analytics monitoring & audits to increase conversions

localize.description: Google Analytics遇上智能算法：在你的Google Analytics数据中找到隐藏的转化机会。一个分析您的数据并准确显示如何提高您的转化率的工具。提供对Google Analytics的审计和24/7监控。
localize.tagline: 谷歌分析监测和审计，以提高转换率。

localize.description: Google Analytics遇上智能算法：在你的Google Analytics數據中找到隱藏的轉化機會。一個分析您的數據並準確顯示如何提高您的轉化率的工具。提供對Google Analytics的審計和24/7監控。
localize.tagline: 谷歌分析監測和審計，以提高轉換率。
